meta.title: Corona Virus Updates - Dallas County Schools

link.title: B. K. Craig Elementary School - News
J. E. Terry Elementary School - News
Dallas County Career Technical Center - News

form.name: aspnetForm

span.p: The Dallas County School COVID-19 Feeding Program will have pick-up sack lunches for people in the community 18 and under from 10:30 AM -12:00 PM at Brantley Elementary, Keith Middle High, and Tipton Middle. This program will run as long as there is participation from the community.

SENIOR HOTLINE: Call 334-407-5070 If you need assistance or have questions regarding your transcript, applications, scholarships, etc. please call this number and leave a message. Please provide your name, grade, and school you attend. Someone will return your phone call within 24-hours.

div.label: Translate Page

span.h2: Dallas County Schools' Collective Responses to the Covid-19 Outbreak
span.p: The Dallas County School board voted to support the Alabama State Department Approved date to end the 2019-20 school year. The Dallas County School System will end the 2019-20 school year on May 22, 2020.

If you need assistance or have questions regarding your transcript, applications, scholarships, etc. please call this number and leave a message. Please provide your name, grade, and school you attend. Someone will return your phone call within 24-hours.

3-23-2020 Dallas County is working on plans for students should the Covid-19 learning disruption be extended past April 6th. As that unfolds, updates will be posted. Please help us gather the necessary information for your household by completing the following survey.

p.a: Dallas County Schools Home Connectivity Survey

span.p:
3-17-2020
Due to the Corona Virus Outbreak, the March 18,2020 Pre-K Lottery will be held Virtually on Facebook Live.
Feeding Program <- (click for more information)
Board Meeting March 17,2020 has been suspended until further notice.

3-15-2020 Dallas County Schools will close for students effective immediately. Employees should report to work tomorrow. Further information will be shared regarding meals and student work. Parents may pickup their Child's medications @ School Monday, March 16, 2020 between 10 AM and 2 PM. Please check back here and on our website for updates.
